content.raw: Hi @hoffman and @ericr86. The final simplesubseg test, with posterior and identify run in different output modes, and with semi-supervised mode enabled, is almost finished, and if this change is accepted then I'll submit that for review as well. Is there anything that needs work on this change? It's just a few lines, and I think we talked about it all in the email thread.
